fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the text track on a video player. In HLS, this maps to the NAME attribute of EXT-X-MEDIA.

fields.name: FileName
fields.description: The file name to the source file. This file is located in the storage container of the asset.

fields.name: HlsSettings
fields.description: The HLS specific setting for the text track.

fields.name: LanguageCode
fields.description: The RFC5646 language code for the text track.

fields.name: PlayerVisibility
fields.description: When PlayerVisibility is set to "Visible", the text track will be present in the DASH manifest or HLS playlist when requested by a client. When the PlayerVisibility is set to "Hidden", the text will not be available to the client. The default value is "Visible".
